sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Apple topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.0%.
Year to date, Apple registers a 48.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 1.2%.
Goldman Sachs Group is showing a gain of 1.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Dowdupont, trading down 1.0%, and Home Depot, trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
